DOC.brief_summary: This study compare efficacy exercise base lumbar extension flexion pain relief prevention pain recurrence chronic low back pain patient .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Comparison Exercises Based Lumbar Extension Flexion Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: 66 people meet inclusion criterion screen test assign one two group randomization . Each group learn one exercise base lumbar extension flexion four week . The main outcome variable measure compare respectively baseline , immediately education , 3 , 6 , 12 , 24 month enrollment . Finally lumbar extension exercise verify whether effective lumbar flexion exercise pain relief prevention pain recurrence chronic low back pain patient .
DOC.criteria: chronic low back pain ( > 6 month , VAS score 5 recent 2 week ) presence discogenic pain Spondylolisthesis retrolisthesis ( > Gr . 2 ) Hx spine surgery Hx spine intervention within 3 month understand conduct protocol study poor medical condition
